dom-gamepad-axes.name: axes
dom-gamepad-axes.summary: The Gamepad.axes property of the Gamepad interface returns an array representing the controls with axes present on the device (e.g. analog thumb sticks).
dom-gamepad-axes.title: Gamepad.axes

dom-gamepad-buttons.name: buttons
dom-gamepad-buttons.summary: The Gamepad.buttons property of the Gamepad interface returns an array of gamepadButton objects representing the buttons present on the device.
dom-gamepad-buttons.title: Gamepad.buttons

dom-gamepad-connected.name: connected
dom-gamepad-connected.summary: The Gamepad.connected property of the Gamepad interface returns a boolean indicating whether the gamepad is still connected to the system.
dom-gamepad-connected.title: Gamepad.connected

dom-gamepad-id.name: id
dom-gamepad-id.summary: The Gamepad.id property of the Gamepad interface returns a string containing some information about the controller.
dom-gamepad-id.title: Gamepad.id

dom-gamepad-index.name: index
dom-gamepad-index.summary: The Gamepad.index property of the Gamepad interface returns an integer that is auto-incremented to be unique for each device currently connected to the system.
dom-gamepad-index.title: Gamepad.index

dom-gamepad-mapping.name: mapping
dom-gamepad-mapping.summary: The Gamepad.mapping property of the Gamepad interface returns a string indicating whether the browser has remapped the controls on the device to a known layout.
dom-gamepad-mapping.title: Gamepad.mapping

dom-gamepad-timestamp.name: timestamp
dom-gamepad-timestamp.summary: The Gamepad.timestamp property of the Gamepad interface returns a DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the last time the data for this gamepad was updated.
dom-gamepad-timestamp.title: Gamepad.timestamp

gamepad-interface.name: Gamepad
gamepad-interface.summary: The Gamepad interface of the Gamepad API defines an individual gamepad or other controller, allowing access to information such as button presses, axis positions, and id.
gamepad-interface.title: Gamepad

dom-gamepadbutton-pressed.name: pressed
dom-gamepadbutton-pressed.summary: The GamepadButton.pressed property of the GamepadButton interface returns a boolean indicating whether the button is currently pressed (true) or unpressed (false).
dom-gamepadbutton-pressed.title: GamepadButton.pressed

dom-gamepadbutton-value.name: value
dom-gamepadbutton-value.summary: The GamepadButton.value property of the GamepadButton interface returns a double value used to represent the current state of analog buttons on many modern gamepads, such as the triggers.
dom-gamepadbutton-value.title: GamepadButton.value

gamepadbutton-interface.name: GamepadButton
gamepadbutton-interface.summary: The GamepadButton interface defines an individual button of a gamepad or other controller, allowing access to the current state of different types of buttons available on the control device.
gamepadbutton-interface.title: GamepadButton

gamepadevent-interface.name: GamepadEvent
gamepadevent-interface.summary: The GamepadEvent() constructor creates a new GamepadEvent object.
gamepadevent-interface.title: GamepadEvent()

gamepadevent-interface.name: GamepadEvent
gamepadevent-interface.summary: The GamepadEvent interface of the Gamepad API contains references to gamepads connected to the system, which is what the gamepad events Window.gamepadconnected and Window.gamepaddisconnected are fired in response to.
gamepadevent-interface.title: GamepadEvent

dom-gamepadevent-gamepad.name: gamepad
dom-gamepadevent-gamepad.summary: The GamepadEvent.gamepad property of the GamepadEvent interface returns a Gamepad object, providing access to the associated gamepad data for fired gamepadconnected and gamepaddisconnected events.
dom-gamepadevent-gamepad.title: GamepadEvent.gamepad

the-gamepadconnected-event.name: gamepadconnected_event
the-gamepadconnected-event.summary: The gamepadconnected event is fired when the browser detects that a gamepad has been connected or the first time a button/axis of the gamepad is used.
the-gamepadconnected-event.title: Window: gamepadconnected event

the-gamepaddisconnected-event.name: gamepaddisconnected_event
the-gamepaddisconnected-event.summary: The gamepaddisconnected event is fired when the browser detects that a gamepad has been disconnected.
the-gamepaddisconnected-event.title: Window: gamepaddisconnected event

event-gamepadconnected.name: ongamepadconnected
event-gamepadconnected.summary: The ongamepadconnected property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when a gamepad is connected (when the gamepadconnected event fires).
event-gamepadconnected.title: Window.ongamepadconnected

event-gamepaddisconnected.name: ongamepaddisconnected
event-gamepaddisconnected.summary: The ongamepaddisconnected property of the Window interface represents an event handler that will run when a gamepad is disconnected (when the gamepaddisconnected event fires).
event-gamepaddisconnected.title: Window.ongamepaddisconnected
